EmailTemplate.name: RASi Quote Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Quote for Prospective Collective Member
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Jordan,
I wanted to introduce you to {!Opportunity.First_Name__c}, owner of [LLC Name]. They need help with [type of service needed]. Please send them a quote so they can start moving forward.
If either of you has any questions, please let me know. Thank you! :)
Best, {!User.Name}
